text: Ectopoglossus absconditus is a frog. It lives in Colombia. ==Home== This frog lives in forests in on hills where there is water in the air. Scientists saw the frog between 800 and 900 meters above sea level. Scientists think this frog might live in one protected park: Parque Nacional Natural Munchique. ==Danger== Scientists do not know whether this frog is in danger of dying out. ==First paper== * ==References== Category:Frogs of South America Category:Poison dart frogs
title: Ectopoglossus absconditus
